name: AsciidocRenderTest
description: Unit tests for the AsciidocRender class, ensuring that various rendering scenarios do not fail.

test_cases.name: renderDoesNotFailWhenPropertyHasBeenRemoved
test_cases.description: Tests that rendering does not fail when a property has been removed.

test_cases.name: renderDoesNotCauseStackOverflowWithRecursiveDefinitions
test_cases.description: Tests that rendering does not cause a stack overflow with recursive definitions.

test_cases.name: renderDoesNotFailWhenHTTPStatusCodeIsRange
test_cases.description: Tests that rendering does not fail when an HTTP status code is a range.

test_cases.name: validateAsciiDocChangeFile
test_cases.description: Tests that the AsciiDoc change file is validated correctly.

test_cases.name: validateAsciiDocRangeStatus
test_cases.description: Tests that the AsciiDoc range status is validated correctly.
